page.title: 20BASILDON NE: LOCAL NEWS II
page.content:
Items in the news recently include:
1.{Speeding.}Residents of Whitmore Way have asked that signs warning motorists to slow down be replaced. The authorities state that there is no point in doing so because they seemed to have little effect. Whitmore Way, one of the oldest roads in the area, is narrow, and has insufficient space for parking.
2.{Playleadership Centre.}Plans for a Â£72,000 playleadership centre have been agreed by the council's Recreation and Leisure Committee. The centre will be built at Northlands Park.
